name: 1337x-dark.PROPER No BS
description:
PROPER: A few fixes to the already really good dark theme by photomachine
https://userstyles.org/styles/153423/1337x-to-dark
additional_info:
-11/01/2019 (happy new year!) :P
Added option for vpn ad removal
Added option for UNTRUSTED account recommendations
Added option for Grayscaling
-06/06-08/2018
Added se domain..
Some icon gray-scaling and small brightness tweaks..
-08/04/2018
Small fix/cleanup..
Added eu domain..
- 24/02/2018
Quote style darkened..
- 07/02/2018
Updated rule..

Fixed TV show section
Fixed some other things.. ;)

style_setting_options.label: Don't Trust IGGGAMES & recommended
I download from IGGGAMES, but include recommended untrusted accounts

yes
